consentModal.title: Cookie Preferences
consentModal.description: We use cookies to enhance your experience and to understand how you interact with our website. You can manage your cookie preferences below.

sections.title: Cookie Usage
sections.description: We use cookies to ensure the basic functionalities of the website and to enhance your online experience. You can choose to opt in or out of each category whenever you want. For more details on cookies, data sharing, and data handling, please read the full privacy policy.

sections.title: Necessary Cookies
sections.description: These cookies are essential for the website’s core functions, such as security, network management, and accessibility. They cannot be disabled.

body.name: NEXT_LOCALE
body.description: Stores the preferred language of the user.

body.name: cc_cookie
body.description: Stores user consent preferences for necessary and analytics cookies.

body.name: _secure_session_id
body.description: Used to identify a user’s session during checkout.

body.name: cart
body.description: Maintains the contents of a user’s cart as they browse.

body.name: checkout_token
body.description: Stores a unique ID for each customer’s checkout session.

sections.title: Performance Cookies
sections.description: These cookies help measure website performance by tracking how users interact with various site elements. They collect anonymous data only, which helps improve the site’s load times, user interface, and efficiency.

body.name: _shopify_s
body.description: Session cookie used for tracking performance.

body.name: _shopify_sa_p
body.description: Used by Shopify to analyze products viewed by users.

sections.title: Analytics Cookies
sections.description: Analytics cookies provide insights into user interactions, helping us improve site usability and content relevance. These cookies may process personal data, requiring explicit user consent.

body.name: _shopify_y
body.description: Tracks session data for analytics purposes.

body.name: _ga
body.description: Used to distinguish users for analytics tracking.

body.name: _gid
body.description: Used to distinguish users within a 24-hour window.

sections.title: Marketing Cookies
sections.description: These cookies are used to track visitors across websites and deliver relevant ads. This includes cross-site tracking and profiling, requiring explicit consent.

body.name: _fbp
body.description: Used by Facebook to deliver personalized advertisements.

body.name: _gcl_au
body.description: Used to test ad effectiveness across Google services.

sections.title: Additional Information
sections.description: For questions regarding our cookie policy or your choices, or to withdraw your consent, please refer to the “Cookie Settings” link available at any time in the website footer or contact us directly.
